product_name: Vestal USS Observer Chrono Watch - Black/Rose Gold
long_description: Decked out in eye-catching black and rose gold, the Vestal USS Observer Chrono watch sports nautical style and precision movement in a bold design that looks great on sailors and landlubbers alike. Solid stainless-steel case and raised bezel help protect the hardened mineral crystal during intense outdoor activity. Large face features a date window at the 3 o'clock position and luminous hands and markers that are easy to see in daylight or after dark. Accurate Japanese movement drives the 5-hand display, including hour, minute and second along with 2 stopwatch dials (minute and second). Screwdown crown and protected buttons help ensure water resistance to 100m (330 ft.). The Vestal USS Observer Chrono watch features a tough and comfortable silicone rubber wristband.
short_description: Decked out in eye-catching black and rose gold, the Vestal USS Observer Chrono watch sports nautical style and precision movement in a bold design that looks great on sailors and landlubbers alike.
